<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basilisk Eye](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2964)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=709" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=727" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 263 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 150 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a shield

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32))</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) a melee attack with the affixed shield.

 
</row>

</column>

---

This slimy green stone glows with whenever the shield it adorns blocks a melee attack. When the eye is activated, the attacker must succeed at a DC 25 Fortitude save or become [slowed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) 1 for 1 minute as its body slowly stiffens in partial petrification.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Basilisk Eye
